wargame.widgets

Class InterfaceWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • wargame.widgets.InterfaceWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InterfaceWidget
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is a layer of graphic sugar put on the map to make the game play more attractive and interactive. It allow to display some animations, paths, squares, etc.
    Author:
    Balthazar Pavot
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
